data.title: The Best Picture Winners of the MMFF (43 shows)
data.meta_description: All of the Best Picture winning films at the Metro Manila Film FestivalNotes: There was no winner at the 12th festival in 1986The award was not given at the 20th festival in 1994
data.text:
The Best Picture Winners of the MMFF

All of the Best Picture winning films at the Metro Manila Film Festival

Notes:

There was no winner at the 12th festival in 1986

The award was not given at the 20th festival in 1994

43 Titles 0 Loves

0% Watched
